info.title: VolcAIOpsKit - Data Source API
info.description: Monitoring data source management related APIs

get.description: Get all Zabbix data sources with optional pagination and name filtering

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of data sources to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of data sources to return

get.description: Get a Zabbix data source by ID

delete.description: Delete a Zabbix data source by ID

parameters.description: Optional name pattern to filter templates by name (supports fuzzy matching)

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-100)
